Sharing Ideas For Charities

Many charities' goals are similar, as is the functionality we require, but little shared working takes place.

By working together, driving shared areas of interest and influencing open source developments we can bring efficies, improve the digital experience for our users, and have great impact.

Together we can make a bigger difference.
